title: 53 - Royal Navy Mission Command at the Battle of Cape St Vincent
description:
This is Part III of our look at Lord Horatio Nelson and the practice of Mission Command.  Check out episode 1 of our Nelson and Mission Command series.

Check out the show notes for the podcast for all of the information that we cover in this episode as well as the images and other details that didn't make it into the podcast.

Join the conversation on Twitter or Facebook.
content:encoded:
This is Part III of our look at Lord Horatio Nelson and the practice of Mission Command.  Check out episode 1 of our Nelson and Mission Command series.

Check out the show notes for the podcast for all of the information that we cover in this episode as well as the images and other details that didn't make it into the podcast.

Join the conversation on Twitter or Facebook.
itunes:subtitle: We look at the Battle of Cape St Vincent and how Nelson used Mission Command and how Admiral Jarvis supported him.
